sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function Inscription() { const [name, setName] = useState() const [lastname, setLastname] = useState() const [password, setPassword] = useState() const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:3001/register', {name, lastname, password}) .then(result => console.log(result)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (
setName(e.target.value)} /> setLastname(e.target.value)} /> setPassword(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Inscription
